nodes.documentation:
@title Owned contract 
it assign a owner at the time of deployment.
nodes.name: Owned

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if the sender is owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev function to change the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Kill funtion to destroy the contract.
It transfers the balance in the smart contract to the owner account if any.
nodes.name: kill
